heroDescription: Folsom, California, is a vibrant city known for its rich history, outdoor recreation, and growing economy.
landscapeDescription: Folsom boasts a diverse economy with strong technology and retail sectors. The city continues to attract new businesses and residents due to its quality of life.
uniqueNeeds: Folsom requires tailored financial strategies to accommodate its growing population and evolving economic landscape.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Folsom's tech focus necessitates diversification to mitigate market volatility. Real estate prices are rising, indicating potential bubble risks. Flooding is a concern; consider geographic investment ...

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Folsom's economy has grown by 4% annually, driven by technology and retail expansion.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Folsom is $100,000, reflecting a well-educated workforce.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Folsom are increasingly specializing in tech and real estate investments.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Folsom's cost of living is 15% higher than the national average, driven by housing and services.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Folsom's housing market is competitive, with home prices increasing by 10% over the past year.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Folsom's business climate is favorable, attracting startups and established companies alike.
